topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556bfae76368725282a81500#post_556bfae76368725282a81500
I thought of something like that.
The plot was basically: alpears to be typical "kill the reactionary authoritarians who look like Nazis."
But as the game goes on and especially when it ends it is revealed to the player that the reactionary authoritarians were in power to oppose you and your nation which is basically an oppressive communist like regime.

The whole point being: it was safe killing them because they nazi-like iconography was used deliberately by the game designers.

More to it than that but that's the basic idea
